title: A gold-embroidered sherwani for Salman Khan in ‘Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’
text: The first trailer of Shah Rukh Khan's 'Dilwale' will be released with Salman Khan's 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' on Diwali. Indian Express 4 days ago - Entertainment Shah Rukh Khan is likely to cross swords with Salman Khan at the box office next Eid, but that has not stopped him from attaching the teaser of his pre-Christmas... Mid-Day 5 days ago - Entertainment The title track of Prem Ratan Dhan Payo is now out. Extremely lavish and grand in it's cinematography, the song is a typical Bollywoodish 90s version. Sung by...
